name: Frillish

evolution.description: Frillish can evolve into Jellicent at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Floating Pokémon. They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: When hit by a melee attack, this Pokémon may roll 1d4. On a result of 4, the opponent who made the attack cannot use the same move on its next turn.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by Self Destruct and Explosion moves.
